decisions.decision: Sigmanauts voted to break out mining pool to be more self-sustaining with 10% DAO tokens going to Sigmanauts
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To make mining pool more autonomous while maintaining connection to Sigmanauts
decisions.quote: the Sigmanauts are doing, we just had our vote for kind of breaking out the mining pool to be more self-sustaining

decisions.decision: Sigmanauts voted to buy about five thousand dollars worth of Ergo merchandise
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To create swag for RareEvo and ongoing sales
decisions.quote: we had a vote pass to buy about five thousand dollars worth of Ergo merchandise

commitments.commitment: Informal session about UTXO DeFi during Coffee with Crypto meetup
commitments.quote: we are thinking to talk exclusively about UTXO DeFi, peer-to-peer DeFi. So I've got some folks here excited about that. So maybe we will do an event about that

commitments.commitment: Finish 6.0 with one big pull request and new big integer data type
commitments.quote: finishing 6.0...finishing yeah, one pull request, the biggest one probably from the morning and I need to finish a new big integer data type...hopefully this week it will be conceptually ready

commitments.commitment: Send 6.0 specification to mining pools representatives
commitments.quote: we will also send them 6.0 specification at some point because it's up to them to vote for it or not

commitments.commitment: Post full list of fiat onramp details and price for community review
commitments.quote: I will take that list along with the price of integration request and I'll post that in Sigmanauts. We'll talk about it and then I'll post it publicly

commitments.commitment: Call with Keystone hardware wallet team including kushti and mgPai
commitments.quote: there will be a call with Lee Sin 10 days from now. So there will be a few Sigmanauts on the call, like me and mgPai

open_questions.question: Whether Rosen should add USDT given KYC and address blocking concerns
open_questions.context: Community asking about USDT support on Rosen bridge

open_questions.question: What's needed tech wise for Keystone hardware wallet integration
open_questions.context: Upcoming call to discuss integration requirements
